welcome_message_body: Welcome to Go Cong, Vietnam! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Go Cong has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coong Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coong Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Vung Tau Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights at Tan Son Nhat International Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights at Tan Son Nhat International Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
